title: Blossom
notes: Was shown at the 2018 Los Angeles Plein Air Festival Exhibition at Farmers & Merchant Bank in Downtown Los Angeles and exhibited at the California Art League's 2018 Expressions exhibit at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif.

title: Old Plaza Firehouse
notes: Was shown at the 2018 Los Angeles Plein Air Festival Exhibition at Farmers & Merchant Bank in Downtown Los Angeles. Won an honorable mention award for other/mixed media. In a private collection in California.

title: La Plaza
notes: Was shown at the 2018 Los Angeles Plein Air Festival Exhibition at Farmers & Merchant Bank in Downtown Los Angeles. In a private collection in California.

title: Surfer Sunrise
notes: Was exhibited at the 2018 California Art League's Expressions exhibit at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. In the artist's personal collection.

notes: Was exhibited at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center's 2018 Rock, Paper, Scissors show, Tarzana, Calif.

title: Baby Honu
notes: Was exhibited at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center's 2018 Rock, Paper, Scissors show, Tarzana, Calif.

title: Manta Ray
notes: Was exhibited at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center's 2018 Rock, Paper, Scissors show, Tarzana, Calif. In a private collection in Washington.

title: Sea Turtle
notes: Was exhibited at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center's 2018 Rock, Paper, Scissors show, Tarzana, Calif.

title: The Board Walk Santa Monica
notes: Was exhibited at the 2017 California Art League's Gold Medal Glow exhibit at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. In the artist's personal collection.

title: Snorkler
notes: Was exhibited at the California Art League's 2018 Fantasy exhibit at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif.

title: Good Morning Sunshine

title: Natures Mirror
alt_title: Nature's Mirror after Edward S. Curtis

title: Nasty Woman
notes: Was exhibited at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center's 2017 Color Me Bold show, Tarzana, Calif. In a private collection in California.

title: Moolack Beach
notes: Was exhibited at the California Art League's 2016/2017 Red show at the at the Blinn House, Pasadena, Calif.

title: Seventh Wave
notes: Was exhibited at the Women's City Club of Pasadena's Muse & Mystique exhibit at the Blinn House, Pasadena, Calif.

title: Big Top Swinger
notes: Winner of the Audience Favorite award at the 2016 California Art Club's Plein Air at the Fair exhibit at the Millard Sheets Art Center, Pomona, Calif. and winner of a Merchandise Award at the 2016 California Art League's Gold Medal Spirits of the Night exhibit at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. Exhibited at the Women's City Club of Pasadena's Muse & Mystique exhibit at the Blinn House, Pasadena, Calif.

title: Eat Your Heart Out
notes: Was exhibited at 2016 California Art League's Gold Medal Spirits of the Night show at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif.

title: Look Both Ways
notes: Was exhibited at the Women's City Club of Pasadena's Passion! exhibit at the Blinn House, Pasadena, Calif. in 2016.

title: Mearle's Drive In
notes: Was featured in Saatchi Art's Made in the USA Collection.

title: Grain of Sanderlings
notes: In a private collection in Washington.

title: Ghost Crab
notes: Was exhibited at the 2015 California Art League's Gold Medal exhibit at the San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif. In the artist's personal collection.

title: Bucerias
notes: In a private collection in New Jersey.

title: Port Angeles
notes: Won Best of Show award at the 2016 California Art League's Flight & Flow exhibit, San Fernando Valley Arts & Cultural Center, Tarzana, Calif.

title: Beach Walker
notes: Won 6th place overall and 4th place in the painting category at the 2015 Light Space & Time's SeaScapes Art online exhibit.

title: Attempted Murder of Crows
notes: Won the Community Award and Purchase Award at the 2012 Juried Student Art Show, Esvelt Art Gallery, Columbia Basin College, Pasco, Wash., and is now part of their permanent collection.
sold_to_company: Esvelt Art Gallery, Columbia Basin College

title: Isla Mujeras
notes: Was exhibited at the Women's City Club of Pasadena's Passion! exhibit at the Blinn House, Pasadena, Calif. in 2016.
